page.title: 20"ME" BY EMMA LAVELLE
page.content: My name is Emma Lavelle and I am a very fortunate girl of twelve as my father is a surgeon in London. We have a comfortable life living in a house called Kingsmead surrounded by beautiful grounds. I have three brothers who all work very hard. My eldest brother, Jonathon, is a doctor, Edward is at Durham University and Alexander is at school. I am also very lucky in having horses and fourteen dogs which we breed, show and love very much. We lead an exciting life. Every summer and Easter we go for a holiday to North Devon and enjoy playing golf. I love my life in the forest and would not give it up for anything. My friends who worked at this project with me are Melissa Prior, Caroline Hardy, Donna Holland, Victoria Bowden, Samantha Reid and Nicola Goodwin.
